metadata.dc:author: Pérez Castillo, A
Mardomingo Sanz, M J
Abrisqueta Zarrabe, J A
metadata.dc:description: A girl with delayed language, overactivity, attention deficit, minor malformations and distal deletion on 11q is described. After GTG and THA banding techniques the proposita was found to have a karyotype: 46,XX, del (11) (pter----q23.3).
metadata.dc:title: Deleción distal 11q y retraso del lenguaje.
[Distal deletion at 11q and language delay].
